name: Dark YouTube Nights
description: Yet another dark youtube theme. A style that applies a dark colored theme to YouTube, without modifying anything else. Best for watching YouTube videos in dark nights. ;)
additional_info:
This style tries to deal with the most pages and areas users will come across while surfing on YouTube. This – besides videos, playlists and search pages – includes a wide range of pages, from the profile page, the Creator Studio and many of the dozens of nested sub pages and popups, as well as external resources like the comments and the login and logout page. PLUS it is compatible with extensions like YouTube Center or AlienTube! Nevertheless this style will never be "done", due to the frequent changes in YouTube's source code and design. Therefore it might be updated several times per month or year as work is in progress. If you find a bug, a regression, or if you think that anything is hardly readable due to the font color, please leave a note in the comments so I can fix it. This applies especially for browsers other than Firefox (the style is developed under Firefox; due to differences in the CSS engines some trickier parts of this style might not work as intended for other browsers) or add-ons. Tell me what I've been missing out on and I'll do my best to complete the style. Most recent updates (color improvements or added features):
  • 2017-07-24:
    • Fixed upload section and some small issues
    • Channel management
    • Note: I will update the style for the new login page Google finally seems to have settled on after changing it thrice in a row
  • 2017-01-01:
    • Fixes for all regressions accumulated over time due to YouTube's CSS changes
  • 2016-07-11:
    • Minor color fix (border in the login screen)
  • 2016-06-26:
    • Fixed the comment box colors
  • 2016-05-31:
    • Fixed various regressions due to YouTube CSS class name changes:
      • Video title
      • Login page
      • Toggle/Slider button
      • Video editor (unfinished)
Recommendation: This style looks awesome together with the FT DeepDark Firefox theme.
